txt.en: You must destroy the fell spirits that have taken up residence in this chamber, as well as their master, if you are to reach the forge and complete the quality you seek.
You have created an empowered sapphire
You must destroy the accursed armoursmiths, as well their wraith master, to dispel the evil they have woven about this ancient forge.
Use the ancient forge to empower your infused sapphire.
